txt.en:
A happy Yule to you! As the cold months settle with a chill upon our shoulders, we have decided to warm hearts and hearths with a particularly exciting festival this winter! I hope you will visit Thorin's Hall to taste some of the glorious beer they have brewed this year, for it is said to be so delicious that folks go mad for it. Also, do not forget to try the new horse races in Bree and the Shire. Here is a formal invitation for your perusing pleasure.

Peace and best wishes ,
Opal Goodbody
